description: Field mapping configuration between HubSpot and Linear. Customize these to match your setup.

statusMapping.description: Maps HubSpot lead status values to Linear customer status names. HubSpot → Linear uses display names, Linear → HubSpot uses internal values.

tierMapping.description: Maps HubSpot ICP/tier values to Linear customer tier names. Note: linearToHubspot must use HubSpot internal values (e.g., tier_1 not Tier 1).
